name: Nessus Security Report File
summary: Learn about .NSR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The NSR format is now deprecated. The .NESSUS format has replaced both the NBE and NSR formats.

description: Text report file generated by Nessus, a security application used for conducting network vulnerability scans; saves summary information for a security scan and contains less verbose information than an .NBE report file; used for network security audits.
